name: 1st got a virus!!1!
description:
More like 1st prize helps baldi remake bruh
You can call it 1st prize helps baldi but bad
You can call it 1st prize helps baldi but lazy

Someone an ask me "Do you feel ashamed while publishing this shit???" YES I DO, NOW SHUT UP.

Sorry, i just really do. I just wanna share my creations.

You know, this mod would be a recreation of old build if baldi's basics plus (Baldi's Basics Full Game - Extremely Early Gameplay With Placeholders Galore - YouTube), but i thought something like "nah", and made typical 1st prize kills you mod. That's why my source code of mod folder is called "oldnewbb+".

Youtubers, you are not making me proud of myself when you publish videos on my mod, and you not need to. Even if your videos appear here. Also 1st prize probably has a covid....

Youtubers played my mod:
